rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast Rite of Renewal, sacrifice all creatures you control but one.
Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Put a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each nontoken creature sacrificed to cast Rite of Renewal.
flavor_text: [i]“It's the only way, Ava. Cast the spell.”[/i]
